description: Describe volumes is supposed to optionally take a list of volume ids, and filter results.  This bug slipped under the radar, because euca-describe-volumes doesn't send in a volume id, but instead filters the results on the client side.  It shows up when using boto and image.update().  You will always get the information from the first image in the list, instead of the image that you are actually recuesting information for.
title: Describe volumes in the ec2 api does not filter results by instance_id
